message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.MA 

This paper deals with the problem of reconstructing the full downlink channel from incomplete uplink channel measurements in Massive MIMO systems. This involves signal processing, wireless communication, and network optimization, which are all relevant to the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The paper also proposes a scheme that builds a bridge between the radio channel and physical signal propagation environment, which involves system modeling and control, making the paper relevant to the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. Additionally, the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed scheme using simulations, which involves modeling and simulation, making the paper relevant to the Multimedia (cs.MM) and Multi-Agent Systems (cs.MA) sub-categories.
